node.html: Created rest services using Flask framework in python for a dashboard used by Portfolio Managers at Fidelity Investments which helps them in making more informed decisions.
A based Java application for automating the cloud pre-migration process at Fidelity Investments which helped in reducing the overall pre-migration time by 90%

An Android application to facilitate better and efective communication between teachers and parents. The system was designed to help track student's attendance, marks, pass on study materials and chat option between teachers and parents.
